posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike Brailey
Very pretty Mathewson with dark cap and less common Sovereign 460 reverse.  Graded SGC50 VG/EX.  Nice color, pretty good centering, nice looking reverse.  Solid card.


Moved to Ebay.



Please contact Mike at mikebrailey@yahoo.com for scans.



Check, money order of paypal accepted.  Please add 3% if paying by paypal.
